title: Top 10 SEO Ranking Factors That Actually Matter in 2024
excerpt: Discover the most important SEO ranking factors for 2024. Learn what Google really cares about and how to optimize your website effectively.
content:
# Top 10 SEO Ranking Factors That Actually Matter in 2024

SEO is constantly evolving, and what worked yesterday might not work today. Here are the ranking factors that truly matter in 2024.

## 1. Content Quality and Relevance

Google's algorithms have become incredibly sophisticated at understanding content quality. Your content must:
- Answer user queries comprehensively
- Provide unique value
- Be well-researched and accurate
- Match user intent

## 2. Core Web Vitals

Page experience signals are crucial:
- **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)**: Should be under 2.5 seconds
- **First Input Delay (FID)**: Should be under 100 milliseconds
- **Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)**: Should be under 0.1

## 3. Mobile-First Indexing

With mobile-first indexing, Google primarily uses your mobile site for ranking:
- Responsive design is essential
- Mobile page speed matters more than ever
- Touch-friendly navigation is crucial

## 4. E-A-T (Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness)

Google evaluates:
- Author credentials and expertise
- Website authority and reputation
- Trustworthiness signals (HTTPS, contact info, etc.)

## 5. Technical SEO

Technical foundation remains critical:
- Clean URL structure
- Proper use of schema markup
- XML sitemaps
- Robots.txt optimization

## 6. User Experience Signals

Google uses various UX signals:
- Bounce rate and dwell time
- Click-through rates
- User engagement metrics

## 7. Backlink Quality

Quality over quantity:
- Links from authoritative domains
- Relevant anchor text
- Natural link building patterns

## 8. Content Freshness

Regularly updated content performs better:
- Update existing content
- Publish new content consistently
- Remove or improve outdated content

## 9. Local SEO Factors

For local businesses:
- Google My Business optimization
- Local citations and NAP consistency
- Customer reviews and ratings

## 10. Featured Snippets Optimization

Optimize for position zero:
- Answer questions directly
- Use proper heading structure
- Include relevant keywords

## Conclusion

Focus on these proven ranking factors while keeping user experience at the center of your SEO strategy. Remember, SEO is a long-term game that requires patience and consistency.
author: WebGlo Team
